content: a pdf file with detailed instructions 10 pages long and has many pictures to help you by working the pattern is available in english us terms i used crochet hook size 2 5mm with yarn 2mm you can use the same pattern to make smaller or larger toy by using finer or bulkier yarn the hook and the yarn size are not really important as long as the hook suitable with yarns if you have any trouble with this pattern you find errors or want to get feedback please feel free to contact me please tag limlenn if you use and upload this sample in instagram thanks for visiting my shop
